captions.text: Jesus Never Died on the Cross
but not the resurrection of Christianity.
In fact Jesus never died on the cross.
for a person to die on the Jewish cross;
and there have been known cases
was taken down from the cross
of his dying on the cross.
that Jesus would be crucified late
so before sunset he would be brought down.
because so much blood had flowed out of the body,
Then he would be kept in a cave,
and the Jews hung him again,
his body would be stolen by his
and Jesus was removed from Judea
As he again became healthy and healed,
and he lived a long life

title: OSHO: Jesus Never Died on the Cross (Preview)

comments.text:
The Quran makes this very clear: "They didn't kill him, neither did they 
crucify him, it was only made to appear so". Crucifixion means killing 
someone on the cross, if he does not die, no crucifixion. It's like taking 
a lethal injection and they only inject 10% of the contents, and you do not 
die. You didn't get a lethal injection even though...you did get some of 
it. "and those who differ therein are full of doubts, with no (certain) 
knowledge, for of a surety they killed him not" Clear.
comments.author: ProxySpam

her the Lord's Prayer. If it was a conspiracy then it was a lie. The 
supposed tomb at Roza Bal in Kashmir has not been Proved to hold Christ's 
remains either. Certain events in history can't be PROVED.

comments.text:
Well, this is not just untrue, but a straight lie. Normally, crucifixtion 
was ended with „crura fracta“, the breaking of the legs, so that death by 
suffocation occured within minutes, as it often had to go quickly. Also in 
this case, as the next day was a sabbath. When they came to Jesus, he 
already was passed out, so they didnt brake his legs, as we read 
(Jo.19;34). To get sure, the executioner stiched in his side (stomach 
artery), so that blood and water sloshed out. You cant be deader.

comments.text:
Jesus is the resurrected sun. Hence Easter sun rise. Sun rises at the east. 
Jesus never existed it was a story about the sun and the 12 constellations 
and our good buddy Paul the apostle himself said it was all allegory: 
Galatians 4:24. Jesus was the light of the world like the sun, born of a 
virgin(Virgo) The death and resurrection has to do with winter solstice on 
Dec 23,24,25. Note 3 days. Friday to Sunday is not 3 days. Jesus' is a 
Greek name his name is Yeshua, Peace and Love. .
comments.author: Othniel Lion of Yah Elohim

comments.text:
Jesus was one of many virgin-born saviors crucified for humanity's sins 
and resurrected after 3 days. It's an old story that developed in agrarian 
cultures. There's not a single thing about Jesus that is unique; no 
miracle, no precept, no parable, no event. It had all been told before, in 
countries as diverse as Britain, China and Mexico. Read up on solar god 
mythology and you'll see what I'm talking about. Of course, if you're too 
scared to open your mind, just ignore my words.
comments.author: coralarch

comments.text:
JESUS DIED ON THE CROSS, NOT ONLY HE DIED BUT ALSO ROSE AGAIN FROM THE 
DEAD. No gurus, no philosophers, not any other gods or kings or hero can 
claim "Resurrection", that is why multiples of millions still follow Jesus. 
You Need to Call on HIS name and See if He is real or not.
